sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there are only two dwarfs jousting. They ride live animals, a dog and a sow. The one meant as a mockery of Stannis bears a shield depicing the black stag on yellow of House Baratheon. Stannis is also vilified in a song by Galyeon of Cuy, which depicts Stannis as an envious and evil man planning on usurping the [[Seven Kingdoms]].
sections.Biography:
===Background===
A [[Dwarfism|dwarf]], he makes a living by performing for other peoples' amusement.

===[[Season 4]]===
He is one of five dwarfs hired by King [[Joffrey]] to re-enact the [[War of the Five Kings]] during the [[Purple Wedding]]. He dresses as [[Stannis Baratheon]] and rides a mount resembling [[Melisandre]]. [[Tyrion Lannister]] and many other guests find the spectacle in poor taste, and he instructs his squire [[Podrick Payne]] to pay each of the dwarfs 20 Gold Dragons afterwards.<ref>"[[The Lion and the Rose]]"</ref>
